pageTextData.title: Costa Coffee
pageTextData.subTitle: A British coffeehouse chain founded in 1971.
pageTextData.description: Since its founding, Costa now exists in over 3000 locations across the world.

pageTextData.title: Costa Coffee In Store
pageTextData.subTitle: Delicious food and drinks
pageTextData.description: Discover a wide range of coffees instore with Costa. Costa offers everything from Smoothies, Hot Milkshakes, to Espressos and Gingerbread Caramel Lattes. Costa does not offer just drinks, but also a wide range of food such as cakes, toasties, and sandwiches!

pageTextData.title: Costa Coffee in a Bottle
pageTextData.subTitle: A range of flavours including Brownie and Caramel

pageTextData.title: Costa in a Can
pageTextData.subTitle: A range of canned refreshing drinks
pageTextData.description: Discover Costa's range of canned drinks including vanilla latte, espresso, double espresso and many other flavours.

pageTextData.x3dCreationMethod: This X3D model of the Costa cup was modelled, UV mapped, and lighting added using Blender, then exported as an FBX to 3DSMax where it was textured and had the touchpoints added, then it was exported to VRML97 and converted using View3DScene to X3D to be displayed here.

pageTextData.galleryDescription: These 3D images of the Coke can, Sprite bottle and Dr Pepper cup are rendered in 3ds Max 2017 with Mental Ray

pageTextData.CameraSubtitle: These buttons select a range of X3D model viewpoints

pageTextData.InteractionPanelCamera: Use the buttons to manipulate the camera
pageTextData.InteractionPanelAnimate: Use the buttons to animate the camera
pageTextData.InteractionPanelRender: Use the buttons to change the rendering options
